EmailTemplate.name: Connectivity New Inv Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity invoice - 49C.... for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer, Please find attached the monthly invoice and call log for your terminal(s). The attached excel version of your invoice contains 3 tabs with specific details of your monthly usage.
If you have questions about your invoice, please e-mail FSSAccounts@honeywell.com or call our Billing Department
US +1 602 365 7020 ext 6
Thank you for using our services!
Best Regards, Honeywell FORGE
Account Services
